name: Falldown Multiball Full
description:
Falldown Multiball is a simple and addictive game that I developed in 2012.

The free version of this game had more than 500.000 installs on Google Play.

Now, I'm publishing the "full" version on itch.io. The full version has more levels to play.

HOW TO PLAY:

- Tilt you device to control the ball.
- Fall through the holes to score points.
- Don't let the ball touch the top of the screen.
- Collect more balls to score more points!
